message: Hey Bob, I'll take $60 and you get $40. That's a fairly good split to start with!

Hi Alice, I know you might consider holding out for your turn, but remember that every round's delay cuts your dollary value by 20%. In round 3 you’d only effectively secure about $64 if you waited, whereas with this offer you get $80 nominally (worth 0.8 * $80 = $64 effective), matching your continuation value. I believe this is as fair as it gets given the discounting—please accept!
